title: Hadn't drawn my favorite ADC in a while.

replies.body:
This looks great. She is my favorite too. 

However, Riot said that they wouldn't change Miss Fortune's base skin due to one main reason. Riot confirmed that Miss Fortune has two outfits that she wears around Bilgewater. One is her Captain outfit that she wears while on official business as seen in her comic and during the Burning Tides event. Her current classic skin is Miss Fortune's bounty hunting outfit that she wears while she isn't doing pirate-y stuff. 

Mainly, her current classic is her Bounty Hunter wear. Her Captain outfit is what Miss Fortune wears while doing strictly pirate stuff.
Your favorite eh? Name says otherwise.

> [{quoted}](name=14daysuspensionk,realm=EUNE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=rxf43ARN,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-06-14T00:08:44.346+0000)
>
> Your favorite eh? Name says otherwise.

I should have clarified, she's my favorite ADC to actually play......I love Jhin but I'm _really_ bad at him.
Same. Jhin is my favorite champ thematically, but I can't last-hit with him for shit.
When a fanart is actually good and not just "keep posting to DeviantArt, practice makes perfect" good.
Yea, this skin should be her default, it fits her more
